thread.title: VIDEO: ‘Jewish man’ Shia LaBeouf arrested over fight with ‘literal nazi’
thread.title_full: VIDEO: ‘Jewish man’ Shia LaBeouf arrested over fight with ‘literal nazi’

author: Greg P.
title: VIDEO: ‘Jewish man’ Shia LaBeouf arrested over fight with ‘literal nazi’
text:
VIDEO: ‘Jewish man’ Shia LaBeouf arrested over fight with ‘literal nazi’ Posted at 8:41 am on January 26, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Libs on Twitter are angry that actor Shia LaBeouf was arrested outside of the Museum of the Moving Image in Queens for assaulting a “literal nazi”: shia labeouf, a jewish man, has been arrested for yelling at a nazi who showed up at a performance to antagonise him. a literal nazi. 
— ellie bate (@eleanorbate) January 26, 2017 buried lede. shia assaulted a nazi, not a human being. https://t.co/qbLPrqlrbi 
— Eric Eidelstein (@ericeidelstein) January 26, 2017 
Here’s the video. If you were expecting a goose-stepping legit Nazi, sorry. It’s just some hipster troll with a nose right (not very popular in the Third Reich) who did say, “Hitler did nothing wrong” (which is awful but it doesn’t make him a “literal Nazi”): Shia LaBeouf has been arrested by NYPD, because of this video #HeWillNotDivideUs #FreeShia pic.twitter.com/Sj8RqP7uGm 
According to Page Six , LaBeouf was charged with misdemeanor assault and released. You can actually see him being led away in cuffs at the end of this short clip from his livestream: Trending
